labels.name: feature
labels.value: To validate login functionality of BSTL PWA

labels.name: story
labels.value: To validate login using valid username and valid password

labels.value: To validate login functionality of BSTL PWA

labels.value: To validate login using valid username and valid password

labels.name: package
labels.value: src.test.resources.features.regression.ValidateLogin_feature.To validate login functionality of BSTL PWA

name: To validate login using valid username and valid password

steps.name: And  user launch PWA using URL "https://bstl-pwa.skordev.com/#/login"
And  user click on langauge change icon using xpath "//div[@class='dropdown']"
And  user change the language Thai to English using xpath "//div[@class='txt--label']"
When  user enters username  'norm@bstl.com' in textbox using xpath "//input[@type='text']"
And  user enters password 'pass' in textbox using xpath "//input[@type='password']"
And  user click on terms & conditions check box using xpath "//input[@type='checkbox']"
And  user click on login button using xpath "//button[@type='submit']"
